title: MAG 087 - Uncanny Valley - Transcript
text:
ins, 
one of the dancers will be wearing his face. 
[Tape clicks off. Tape clicks on.] 
ARCHIVIST 
Hmm. What strikes me more than anything else here is the date. It’s only a 
year or so before she died. I had assumed Gertrude had recorded to tape for a 
while and then stopped, but it seems she was recording them right up until the 
end. But if they did span decades of working at the Institute, why aren’t there 
more? And what decided which statements she transferred? 
Regardless, whoever my mystery pen pal is, it seems they’re pushing me in a 
very deliberate direction. It sounds like the Unknowing is a ritual, one 
connected to the Stranger, this ‘I Do Not Know You’. What did Gertrude mean 

The Magnus Archives – MAG087 – The Uncanny Valley 
12 
 
about skin? The page she was given by Mary, maybe? No, that doesn’t add up. 
(Sigh) God, this is confusing. 
For the first time, though, I feel like I might have a lead. It’s tangential, not 
directly connected to the Stranger or the Unknowing, but… but I have a name 
now. Jude Perry, and she was still living in London less than two years ago. It’s 
not much, but it is a start. I don’t know if I have the resources to track her 
down myself, but if Melanie’s willing to help, the Institute might have more 
luck. 
[The sound of strange music] 
ARCHIVIST 
If she is an active member of the Lightless Flame cult there’s every possibility 
tracking her down will be dangerous, but it’s also the… the only…? 
Oh god… 
[Georgie opens the door] 
GEORGIE 
Can you hear that? Like a, an ice cream van or something? 
ARCHIVIST 
Circus! 
GEORGIE 
Yeah. Yeah, thought I was going mad. Christ, are you alright? 
[The music fades.] 
ARCHIVIST 

The Magnus Archives – MAG087 – The Uncanny Valley 
13 
 
Ummm… 
GEORGIE 
Was it the tape? 
ARCHIVIST 
What? No! No, it w– it w– it was – it was outside. 
GEORGIE 
No, not, not the music, your face! 
ARCHIVIST 
What? 
GEORGIE 
That’s it. Whatever the hell this deal is, the tapes, documents, I don’t want 
them in my house. 
ARCHIVIST 
Look, look… No, no… Look, you, you don’t need to be scared. 
GEORGIE 
I’m not! You are! Look at you, you can barely stand! 
ARCHIVIST 
But I… But I need – 
GEORGIE 

The Magnus Archives – MAG087 – The Uncanny Valley 
14 
 
Listen to me, John. I can’t stop you doing… whatever secret bullshit you want 
to do, and I’m… not going to throw you out on the street, but I’m not having it 
in by home. 
ARCHIVIST 
No… No, they won’t. I’ll make sure it doesn’t… I’ll keep it far away. 
GEORGIE 
No, you need to stop. 
ARCHIVIST 
I’m not sure I can. 
[Tape clicks off] 
[The Magnus Archives Theme - Outro]
